errors.unknown: Something went wrong while executing your request, please try again later.
errors.credentials: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.forbidden: You are not allowed to perform this action.
errors.not_found: The server was unable to find the information you requested.
errors.server_offline: The server is offline, the system is temporarily unavailable.
errors.server_timeout: The server took too long to respond, please try again. If this keeps happening, please contact the administrator
errors.bad_request: Incomplete request sent, please check it and try again.
errors.payload_too_large: The file is too large to be uploaded.
errors.wrong_current_password: The filled in current password is incorrect.

auth.header_signin: Log in with username and password
auth.message_forgotten_password: Enter your e-mail address below and we will send you an e-mail to reset your password.
auth.message_reset_completed: An email has been send to you with instructions to reset your password.
auth.message_password_changed: Your password has been successfully updated, you can now login with the new password.
auth.message_invalid_hash: The used reset token is invalid or has already been used, please check if you used the correct link or request a new password reset.
auth.password_mismatch: The entered passwords do not match
auth.password_no_difference: The new password cannot be the same as the old password
auth.wrong_credentials: The combination of the username and password is incorrect. Please try again.

change_password.message_success: Your password has been successfully changed, you now have to login with the new password.
